content: TE 50-22 Cordless rotary hammer Compact and cordless SDS Max (TE-Y) rotary hammer drill with lighter weight, more power and less vibration for drilling and chiseling in concrete (Nuron battery) ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Rotary hammers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Power and versatility for tough jobs - broad range of inserts combined with brushless motor for higher performance drilling, chiseling, and coring Work more comfortably - ergonomic design and Active Vibration Reduction (AVR) technology helps reduce user fatigue on the jobsite Safer work environments - Hilti´s innovative Active Torque Control (ATC) provides more protection from tool over-rotation when drill bits get stuck Drop protection - more robust battery plus metal battery garage protect against rotary hammer failures after accidental drops On the Nuron battery platform - cordless tools without compromise thanks to longer-lasting batteries and a range of services to keep you more productive, today and tomorrow Applications Versatile rotary hammer drill for concrete construction work and building services installation Drilling holes for pipe penetrations or electrical outlets through concrete and masonry Chiseling in concrete, masonry, tiles and plaster for demolition Ideal for repetitive drilling in rebar ### TECHNICAL DATA: Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery: 12.1 lb. Optimum Hammer drilling range: 5/8 - 1-3/8 in Hammer drilling diameter range: 15/32 - 3-7/32 in Technical Data | Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery | 12.1 lb | Optimum Hammer drilling range | 5/8 - 1-3/8 in | Hammer drilling diameter range | 15/32 - 3-7/32 in | Single impact energy | 4.4 ft-lbs | Hammer drilling RPM | 360 rpm | Full hammering frequency | 3510 impacts/minute | Functionality | Active Torque Control (ATC), Active Vibration Reduction (AVR), Chiseling, Hammer drilling | Triaxial vibration for chiseling into concrete | 6.8 m/s² | 1 | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 99 dB (A) | 2 | A-weighted emission sound power level | 107 dB (A) | 3 | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 2370436 - Cordless rotary hammer TE 50-22 case - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 50-22 Cordless rotary hammer - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml - 1x TE 50-22 Tool case assy
